title: The One About Water
description:
Bob and Monet talk about cities with the BEST and WORST customer service, they argue about how early you should arrive at a concert, and they dive into the topic of water discussing everything from hurricanes to European spring water to the bottled water industry.
Go to https://MasterClass.com/RIVALRY for 15% off MasterClass!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
